perturbation.original_text: Sponsor shall provide drkoop.com with Sponsor Advertising Content artwork at least five business days in advance of the publication date.
perturbation.changed_text: Sponsor shall provide drkoop.com with Sponsor Advertising Content artwork at least five business days in advance of the publication date. However, drkoop.com may, at its sole discretion, waive this requirement and accept Sponsor Advertising Content artwork with less than five business days' notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires Sponsor to provide artwork at least five days in advance. The added sentence gives drkoop.com the discretion to waive this requirement, creating uncertainty about whether the Sponsor is actually obligated to adhere to the five-day notice period.

perturbation.original_text: Drkoop.com shall provide to Sponsor any and all User Data for which the Individual User has specifically authorized release to Sponsor. In the event that an Individual User grants rights to Sponsor for use of his User Data, Sponsor shall use its best efforts to keep User Data confidential and shall only use such data in an ethical manner. Sponsor may use User Data for its owns purposes, but User Data may not be disclosed, sold, assigned, leased or otherwise disposed of to third parties by Sponsor.
perturbation.changed_text: Drkoop.com shall provide to Sponsor any and all User Data for which the Individual User has specifically authorized release to Sponsor. In the event that an Individual User grants rights to Sponsor for use of his User Data, Sponsor shall use its best efforts to keep User Data confidential and shall only use such data in an ethical manner. While Sponsor may use User Data for its own purposes, subject to applicable privacy laws, Sponsor retains the right to share aggregated, anonymized User Data with third-party marketing partners.
perturbation.explanation: The original text strictly prohibits the disclosure, sale, or assignment of User Data to third parties. The modified text allows Sponsor to share 'aggregated, anonymized User Data,' creating a contradiction regarding data sharing restrictions and making it difficult to ascertain the extent to which user data can be shared.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days' written notice of a breach by the other party, provided such breach is not cured within such thirty-day period.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement upon thirty (30) days' written notice of a breach by the other party, provided such breach is not cured within such thirty-day period. Notwithstanding the foregoing, drkoop.com reserves the right to immediately terminate this agreement for any material breach of Article 6.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause allows for termination only after a 30-day cure period. The added sentence allows drkoop.com to immediately terminate for a material breach of Article 6, contradicting the initial 30-day cure period and creating uncertainty about the actual termination process.
